mil7.3.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bījassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.3.3:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, bījaṃ appakampi samānaṃ bhaddake khette vuttaṃ deve sammā dhāraṃ pavecchante subahūni phalāni anudassati;
mil7.3.3:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yathā paṭipāditaṃ sīlaṃ kevalaṃ sāmaññaphalamanudassati.
mil7.3.3:5.5: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bījassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.3.3:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bījaṃ suparisodhite khette ropitaṃ khippameva saṃvirūhati;
mil7.3.3:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānasaṃ supariggahitaṃ suññāgāre parisodhitaṃ satipaṭṭhānakhettavare khittaṃ khippameva virūhati.
mil7.3.3:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bījassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
